How to open an Easypaisa Account (Updated 2023)

January 1, 2014 by{" "} Mark

Financial transactions of the day have met such convenience of operations which weren’t even imaginable in Pakistan a few years ago. Gone are the days when you’d have to travel to a certain bank to transfer funds to another account. One can now transfer funds through Easypaisa to another account without any hassle. The process is simple and easy to understand. Any mobile subscriber can create an Easypaisa account to avail the facility of transferring and receiving funds in a matter of few minutes.

It is noteworthy to mention that an Easypaisa account is actually a bank account on your phone. The account can be used for the payment of bills, transferring of funds and quite a few other features which include international home transfer, easy load, other mobile network load, donations and funds transfer to any bank account.

How to open an Easypaisa bank account?

  1. Download an Easypaisa mobile app if you an Android, iOS or Huawei user
  2. Upon successful installation, launch the app
  3. Enter your mobile number and hit ‘Next’
  4. Enter your CNIC number, date of issuance and tap on ‘Register
  5. OTP will be auto-fetched and you will be required to wait for a very brief time
  6. You will have to read and accept the terms and conditions
  7. Create your 5-digit pin code and you will be good to use Easypaisa mobile account

Steps for opening an Easypaisa account:

For Telenor users

  • If you are a Telenor user, simply dial{" "} *786# from your phone to open an account
  • Enter your CNIC number and date of issuance
  • Create a 5-digit pin code
  • Re-enter your 5-digit pin code for the sake of confirmation and you are ready to login
  • Your Easypaisa account is created

For Jazz, Ufone and Zong users

  • If you are a Jazz, Ufone or Zong  user, simply dial *2262# from your phone to open an account
  • Enter your CNIC number and date of issuance
  • Create a 5-digit pin code
  • Re-enter your 5-digit pin code for the sake of confirmation and you are ready to login
  • Congratulations! Your Easypaisa account will be created

How do I deposit funds in my Easypaisa account?

All you need is to deposit funds in your Easypaisa account. You can deposit your money through:

  • Any of the 75,000 Easypaisa shops across the country
  • You can locate the nearest Easypaisa store by clicking here
  • Bank transfer from any bank account
  • Money transfer from any other Easypaisa account
  • Any local or international Visa/Mastercard Credit or Debit Card holder can also top up his account through any VISA/MasterCard.

Hurrah! Your Easypaisa account has been created and your phone number will now be your Easypaisa account.
Transferring funds couldn’t have been more easy!

Benefits of having an Easypaisa account

The advantages are aplenty and we’ll discuss only the major ones:

  • Payment of utility bills
  • Time-saving as all financial deals are possible via just one click
  • Cheaper service rates in comparison to other online services
  • Transferring funds to any other bank account
  • Send donations to charities
  • International money transfer
  • Offers different insurances too
  • Prepaid and postpaid users can top-up and pay their phone bills respectively
  • Facility of ATM card is also available

For further information, you may head here.
